description.common:
chitosan increases effects of antithrombin alfa by Other (see comment). Use Caution/Monitor. 
Comment: Chitosan can decrease GI absorption of vitamin K, enhancing anticoagulant effects.

chitosan increases effects of antithrombin III by Other (see comment). Use Caution/Monitor. 
Comment: Chitosan can decrease GI absorption of vitamin K, enhancing anticoagulant effects.

Comment: Chitosan can decrease GI absorption of vitamin K, enhancing anticoagulant effects.

Comment: Chitosan can decrease GI absorption of vitamin K, enhancing anticoagulant effects.
chitosan decreases levels of vitamin A by inhibition of GI absorption. Applies only to oral form of both agents. Minor/Significance Unknown.
chitosan decreases levels of vitamin E by inhibition of GI absorption. Applies only to oral form of both agents. Minor/Significance Unknown.
